calculator.validationError: Please review the inputs and try again.
calculator.combinationError: We do not currently ship that combination—choose another option.
calculator.title: Delivery cost calculator
calculator.subtitle: Model your shipping charge in seconds. Spend thresholds unlock complimentary delivery automatically.
calculator.emptyPrompt: Enter your details and tap submit to preview shipping.

promises.title: Proactive tracking
promises.description: Receive live courier milestones in your language with ETA adjustments by the minute.

promises.title: Flexible destinations
promises.description: Redirect to a DPD Pickup, DHL locker, or concierge desk with two taps from the tracking link.

promises.title: Carbon-aware logistics
promises.description: We consolidate shipments daily and offset through verified regenerative textile projects.

packingSteps.title: Order confirmed
packingSteps.description: Smart routing picks the closest fulfilment centre and assigns the best-fit sleeve inventory.

packingSteps.title: Performance check
packingSteps.description: Each garment passes a moisture-wicking and sleeve seal inspection before bagging.

packingSteps.title: Secure packaging
packingSteps.description: Tamper-proof seals and recycled cushioning keep your one-sleeve pristine in transit.

packingSteps.title: Courier hand-off
packingSteps.description: We hand over to trusted partners with insurance matching your order value by default.

dutyInsights.detail: Orders ship from our Rotterdam micro-fulfilment hub—no additional duty for EU customers.
Import duties are pre-paid up to $800; higher values are handled seamlessly via DHL brokerage.
We pre-calculate VAT and duties at checkout, so there are no surprises at delivery.

sections.speedsDescription: Pricing auto-adjusts for your locale at checkout. Express and same-day options appear when your postcode qualifies.

metadata.title: Delivery Information | Coello Help
metadata.description: View Coello delivery speeds, pricing, and courier partners across the UK, EU, and North America.

title: Delivery information
description: Everything you need to know about dispatch cut-offs, pricing, and how Coello keeps parcels secure.
